saltong-help.summary:
Guess the word in {{numTries}} tries.

Each guess must be a valid {{wordLength}} letter word. Hit the enter button to submit.

After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.
saltong-help.ex1: The letter {{letter}} is in the word and in the correct spot.
saltong-help.ex2: The letter {{letter}} is in the word but in the wrong spot.
saltong-help.ex3: The letters are not in the word in any spot.
saltong-help.schedule: A new word will be avaiable everyday at 12 midnight PHT
